                        $this->EnableRegistration = intval( $Settings->get_setting( 'enable_registration' , 1 ) );

Definition at line 831 of file user_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PermitFilter = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'permit_filter' , false );
                        
                        if( $PermitFilter !== false )
                        {
                              $Users = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_users_for_permit( $PermitFilter );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              /* all users */
                              $Users = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_users_for_permit( 'registered' );
                        }
                        
                        return( $Users );
                  }

Definition at line 471 of file user_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'set' ) )
                        {
                              $UserLogin = $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'string' );
                              $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $UserLogin );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $UserId = $this->Security->get_gp( 'user_id' , 'integer' , 0 );
                              if( $UserId == 0 )
                              {
                                    $UserId = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id();
                              }
                              
                              $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_by_id( $UserId );
                        }
                        
                        $this->Output = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'full_profile.tpl' );
                        $this->Output = $this->String->print_record( $this->Output , $User );
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{logout_button}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->logout_button( $Options );
                              $Str = str_replace( '{logout_button}' , $this->Output , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{login_button}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->login_button( $Options );
                              $Str = str_replace( '{login_button}' , $this->Output , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{auto_open_login_dialog}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->auto_open_login_dialog( $Options );
                              $Str = str_replace( '{auto_open_login_dialog}' , $this->Output , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{switch_user_button}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->switch_user_button( $Options );
                              $Str = str_replace( '{switch_user_button}' , $this->Output , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );

process_months_on_site ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'months_on_site'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 940 of file user_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'months_on_site' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_by_id( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'user_id' ) );
                              
                              $Code = time() - strtotime( get_field( $User , 'registered' ) );
                              $Code = intval( $Code / ( 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 ) );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{months_on_site:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

)

$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 711 of file user_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Mode = $this->UserAlgorithms->logged_in() ? 'logged_in' : 'guest';
                        $AdditionalMode = $this->UserAlgorithms->logged_in() ? 'guest' : 'logged_in';
                        
                        if( $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'auth:'.$Mode , 'auth:~'.$Mode ) )
                        {
                              $Str = $this->String->show_block( $Str , 'auth:'.$Mode , 'auth:~'.$Mode , $Changed );
                        }

                        if( $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'auth:'.$AdditionalMode , 'auth:~'.$AdditionalMode ) )
                        {
                              $Str = $this->String->hide_block( 
                                    $Str , 'auth:'.$AdditionalMode , 'auth:~'.$AdditionalMode , $Changed
                              );
                        }
                        
                        if( $this->UserAlgorithms->logged_in() )
                        {
                              $Str = str_replace( '{session_login}' , $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login() , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_user_list ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'user_list'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 881 of file user_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'user_list' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );

                              $Users = $this->fetch_users( $this->BlockSettings );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $Field = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'field' , 'login' );
                              
                              $Code = '';
                              
                              foreach( $Users as $i => $id )
                              {
                                    $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_by_id( $id );
                                    $Code .= "{checkbox:name=_$Name".get_field( $User , 'id' ).";current_value=on}".
                                                 get_field( $User , $Field )."<br>";
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{user_list:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->EnableRegistration === 1 || 
                              $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'user_manager' ) )
                        {
                              $UserController = get_package( 'user::user_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              if( $Security->get_gp( 'user_action' ) && $UserController->RegistrationWasPassed )
                              {
                                    if( $UserController->RegistrationConfirm )
                                    {
                                          $this->Output = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'confirm_registration.tpl' );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $this->Output = '{lang:registration_complete}';
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {                             
                                    $Template = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'registration_form.tpl' );
                                    $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $_POST );
                                    
                                    $this->Output = $Template;
                              }
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->Output = '{lang:registration_is_disabled}';
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

                        $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_switch_user' );
                        $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_short_profile' );
                        $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_full_profile' );
                        $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_update_user_form' );
                        $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_user_line' );
                        
                        $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
                        
                        return( $this->Output );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
